code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/jangyoungju/Desktop/webproject/homework/project/myreact/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import axios from"axios";var changeTitle=function changeTitle(e,setTitle){setTitle(e.target.value);};var changeDate=function changeDate(e,setDate){setDate(e.target.value);};var addTodo=function addTodo(title,date,completed,setTodo,setTitle,setDate,setCompleted,navigate){var newTodo={title:title,date:date,completed:false};setTodo(function(prevTodo){return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(prevTodo),[newTodo]);});setTitle('');setDate('');axios.post('http://localhost:8000/add',newTodo).then(function(res){navigate('/list');console.log(res.data);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});var input=document.querySelector('.inputDate');input.value='';input=document.querySelector('.inputTitle');input.value='';};var getChecked=function getChecked(id,completed){console.log(id);axios.post("http://localhost:8000/completed/".concat(id),{id:id,completed:completed}).then(function(res){console.log('success to checked completed');}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export{changeDate,changeTitle,addTodo,getChecked};
